meanings.definition: The act or process of making wine.
meanings.sent1: Her winemakings resulted in a delicious batch of homemade wine.
meanings.sent2: The winemakings at the vineyard are done with great care and attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: After a long day of winemakings, she accidentally spilled grape juice all over herself.
meanings.sent4: The winemakings in the cellar were like a symphony of flavors coming together.
meanings.sent5: His passion for winemakings shone through in every bottle he produced.

meanings.definition: The occupation or business of making wine.
meanings.sent1: Many people dream of starting their own winemakings business one day.
meanings.sent2: The winemakings industry in this region has been booming for years.
meanings.sent3: She decided to pursue winemakings as a career after a memorable trip to a vineyard.
meanings.sent4: In the world of winemakings, competition can be fierce but rewarding.
meanings.sent5: His family has been involved in winemakings for generations, passing down their knowledge.
